items.title: cycle-level retrospectives optimization
items.hypothesis: Improving cycle-level retrospectives will increase risk-adjusted profitability under strict growth mode.
items.acceptance_test: Must pass backtest + walk-forward + monte carlo + risk governor before promotion.

items.title: hierarchical regime-switching return density + online recalibration
items.hypothesis: A hierarchical Bayesian regime-switching model with daily temperature recalibration will reduce overconfidence and improve risk-adjusted allocations.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 24-month walk-forward with realistic costs: NLL improves >=8%, VaR95 exceedance within 4.5-5.5%, and net Sharpe +0.15.

items.title: conformal multi-horizon quantile ensemble with drift alarms
items.hypothesis: Conformalized quantile forecasts with automatic drift-triggered recalibration will stabilize interval coverage and lower overconfident losses.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 8-week shadow A/B: coverage error <=2pp, ECE <=0.03, and max drawdown improves by >=10%.

items.title: queue-position-aware child-order scheduler
items.hypothesis: Fill-hazard and queue-decay aware passive/aggressive switching will reduce adverse selection while preserving completion.
items.acceptance_test: Pass randomized parent-order A/B: shortfall improves >=18%, completion delta within +/-1.5%, no p95 slippage regression.

items.title: toxicity-aware cross-venue router with dynamic dark/displayed mix
items.hypothesis: Real-time venue toxicity scoring and adaptive venue mix will reduce market impact volatility and slippage variance.
items.acceptance_test: Pass staged rollout (10%->50% flow): impact improves >=12%, slippage variance >=20% lower, fill-rate decline <2%.

items.title: hierarchical expected-shortfall governor with auto-deleveraging
items.hypothesis: Marginal ES97.5 budgets by sleeve plus intraday auto-deleveraging will lower tail losses with limited CAGR sacrifice.
items.acceptance_test: Pass two consecutive 6-month shadow periods: ES improves >=20%, max drawdown >=15% lower, CAGR drag <=2%.

items.title: bayesian capacity-aware kelly allocation overlay
items.hypothesis: Bayesian Kelly fractions with uncertainty shrinkage and nonlinear capacity penalties will increase geometric growth at fixed tail risk.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 10 rolling 1-year OOS windows: >=7 wins vs risk-parity baseline and aggregate uplift >=150 bps/year after costs.

items.title: auto-tuned heterogeneous execution layer across MLX/MPS/CUDA
items.hypothesis: Operator-level auto-routing and kernel fusion across accelerators will materially cut research cycle latency without signal drift.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 100-job retrain+backtest benchmark: median runtime >=35% faster and top-10 strategy rank overlap >=95%.

items.title: gpu-resident simulator with graph-captured scenario batches
items.hypothesis: Device-resident state with graph-captured simulation replay will remove Python launch overhead and raise scenario throughput.
items.acceptance_test: Pass fixed-seed 1000-scenario replay: throughput >=4x, checksum match >=99.9%, cost/scenario increase <=5%.

items.title: typed handoff contracts with adversarial reviewer agent
items.hypothesis: Mandatory versioned handoff contracts with an adversarial reviewer will cut context-loss and promotion defects.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 4-week A/B on 50 promotions: defect escapes improve >=30% with <=10% promotion-latency overhead.

items.title: cross-agent trace graph with handoff quality scoring
items.hypothesis: Trace-linked lineage and handoff completeness scoring will reduce MTTR and make failures reproducible faster.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 20 seeded incident drills over 6 weeks: MTTR improves >=40% and lineage replay coverage >=95%.

items.title: counterfactual limit-orderbook generator for rare stress replay
items.hypothesis: Diffusion-generated LOB stress paths will expose fragility before deployment and improve robustness in tail regimes.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 500 synthetic stress scenarios + 200 real replays: failure-rate drops >=30% without reducing base-case PnL expectancy.

items.title: causal feature gating with intervention consistency tests
items.hypothesis: Using causal-stability gates will remove spurious alpha features that break during regime shifts.
items.acceptance_test: Pass historical intervention suite across 6 regime transitions: drawdown in transition windows improves >=20%.

items.title: tri-horizon intent fusion with disagreement penalty
items.hypothesis: A short/mid/long horizon intent fusion model with disagreement penalties will reduce noisy entries.
items.acceptance_test: Pass OOS replay: false entries down >=25% while net return stays flat or better after fees.

items.title: liquidity shock sentinel with pre-hedge trigger
items.hypothesis: Early liquidity-shock detection with temporary hedge overlays will reduce crash-window equity damage.
items.acceptance_test: Pass top-30 shock windows backtest: median crash-window drawdown improves >=18% with <=5% normal-regime drag.

items.title: options-implied volatility surface as spot risk filter
items.hypothesis: Using options-implied vol term structure to gate spot entries will avoid poor convexity windows.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 12-month OOS with options feed active: Sharpe uplift >=0.12 and turnover increase <=12%.

items.title: digital twin execution replay with policy search
items.hypothesis: A calibrated execution twin with policy search will improve child-order policy selection per market state.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 3-month replay benchmark: cost improves >=15% across at least 70% of symbols.

items.title: feature-store merkle integrity with delayed-label quarantine
items.hypothesis: Cryptographic feature lineage checks plus delayed-label quarantine will reduce silent data corruption and leakage.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 60-day run with continuous checksum audit and no leakage violations detected by holdout sentinel tests.

items.title: strategy retirement tournament with autonomous replacement
items.hypothesis: Tournament-based retirement and replacement will keep the pool adaptive and reduce stale-alpha drag.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 8-week simulation: stale-capital share <=10% and net portfolio return improves vs non-retirement control.

items.title: proof-carrying promotion packets with deterministic replay hash
items.hypothesis: Promotion packets that include replay hashes and evidence proofs will prevent unverifiable promotions.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 100 consecutive promotion attempts with deterministic replay verification and zero unverifiable packets.

items.title: profit-quality index combining pnl, stability, and tail cost
items.hypothesis: A composite profit-quality index will prevent budget growth on unstable alpha and improve long-run compounding quality.
items.acceptance_test: Pass 6-week shadow budget policy: PQI-gated escalations improve risk-adjusted PnL versus raw-PnL escalations.
